sections.heading: Motorcycle, defined.Motorcycle means any motor vehicle having a seat or saddle for use of the operator and designed to travel on not more than three wheels in contact with the ground
sections.text: Motorcycle includes an autocycle.SourceLaws 2005, LB 274, ยง 40;Laws 2015, LB231, ยง 9;Laws 2018, LB909, ยง 48.
